issue.title: [Python] Test serialization for determinism
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
see discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2216

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2811?focusedCommentId=16537100) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Isn't it already fixed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2216 ? What remains to be done here?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2811?focusedCommentId=16537249) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Yes, I cherry-picked Philipp's patch into there. Resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/1a419fe8c3deabc0f16bb1089ed523b9ce57ffa7
